categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Jerell was a male Human native of the planet Alderaan. Jerell survived the destruction of his homeworld and went on to become a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. By 2 ABY, Jerell had become a personal aide to Rebel General Vanden Willard. During this time, he accompanied the general aboard the freighter Gamble on a mission to acquire supplies for the construction of Echo Base on Hoth.
